custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is asking for the stat leaders on a given team

2. What Yankee has the most home runs?
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the response is grouped by Individual
AND player image is displayed

i.e. 
1. Deeplink: mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=hitting&stat=hr&team_id=147
2. Deeplink: mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=hitting&stat=hr&team_id=147

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is asking for the team's aggregate numbers for a stat

i.e. How many home runs do the Yankees have

title: Default Stat Type

AND accesses the questions interface of Ask At Bat
custom_steps:

AND no stat type (batting/pitching/fielding) is specified
custom_expected: THEN At Bat will default to batting stats

title: Unable to Find Stats Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on At Bat
AND accesses the questions interface of Ask At Bat
AND the user is on the batting stats
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a query for a stat that is not found in that stats category

i.e. 
- Batter with most ERA (ERA is only a pitching stat category)
- Pitcher with the most RBIs (RBI is only a hitting stat category)
custom_expected:
THEN the bot will drop users on the default stats category page

i.e. 
- Batter with most ERA || mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=hitting&stat=era (user is taken to hitting stats tab)
- Pitcher with the most RBIs || mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=pitching&stat=rbi (user is taken to pitching stats tab)


As such BAMbot needs to use in the deep link for all non-batting stats, even when that stat is specific only to a kind of stat
- stat_type=pitching (i.e. mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=pitching&stat=so)
- stat_type=hitting (i.e. mlbatbat://stats?stat_type=hitting&stat=hr&league_code=nl&section=team)

title: One Leader - BA, OBP, OPS, SLG, ERA, BAA, WHIP
custom_preconds: As a baseball fan, I would like to be able to ask BAMbot about current season stats and receive a text/voice response in slack or on my voice response enabled device (Echo, Google Home, etc).
custom_steps:
WHEN the user asks/enters a leader stats query for: BA, OBP, OPS, SLG, ERA, BAA, WHIP
AND it's in the current season
AND there is only one leader

i.e.
- Who has the best BA, OBP, OPS, SLG, ERA, BAA, WHIP in the league?
- Which pitcher has the best ERA, BAA, WHIP on the teamName this year?
- Who has the best BA, OBP, OPS, SLG?
- Which position the best BA, OBP, OPS, SLG this year?
custom_expected:
THEN the bot responds with the individual leader in the current season for the stat specified

i.e.
- Max Scherzer currently leads the Washington Nationals with an ERA of 2.51.
- Jose Altuve of the Houston Astros currently leads Major League Baseball with a batting average of .346.
